### Copper Smelting Area at (4,4)

### Power Generation System at (-9.5, 24.5)
An integrated power generation system consisting of:
- Offshore pump at position (-9.5, 24.5)
- Boiler at position (-7.0, 24.5) containing coal fuel
- Steam engine at position (-2.5, 24.5)
- Connected via pipe networks:
  - Water pipes from pump to boiler
  - Steam pipes from boiler to steam engine
- Electric pole network at positions (4.5,8.5), (4.5,20.5), (0.5,24.5), (4.5,12.5), (4.5,16.5)

### Research Facility
- Lab (position not specified) connected to power network, currently without power

# ERROR TIPS

### Resource/Recipe Availability Errors
- Cannot craft items that require automation technology (like assembling machine 1) before researching automation
- Wood is a raw resource that must be gathered, not crafted
- Ensure required technologies are researched before attempting to craft items that depend on them

### Inventory Management Errors
- Verify required materials are in inventory before placing structures (stone furnace, offshore pump)
- Ensure you have all sub-ingredients for complex recipes before attempting to craft
- Check inventory has sufficient quantities of required items before crafting (iron plates, iron gear wheels)

### Furnace Operation Errors
- Cannot insert different ore types into furnaces that already contain another type (copper ore into iron ore furnace)
- Ensure furnaces have both fuel and ore before expecting output

### Connection Errors
- Ensure you have required connection items (like pipes) in inventory before attempting to connect entities
- When connecting entities, verify you have all required materials in inventory first

### Power System Errors
- Labs and other machines will show NO_POWER status until properly connected to a working power generation system
- Ensure complete power infrastructure (generation, transmission, and connection to machines) is in place
